description: A spacious, cozy apartment conveniently located by Central Park, Riverside Park, Morningside Park, and St. John The Devine.  This apartment is very accessible, just 1 block from the 1 train and close to the  Cathedral Parkway Subway Station (1, B and C trains). You can get anywhere in Manhattan quickly! The area has restaurants and history galore, not to mention a 24 hour grocery store and pharmacy around the corner. We love our apartment and hope you will too!
name: An Oasis in the Big Apple
review: Very charming, clean, and spacious apartment in an interesting and diverse neighborhood. Great communication and very easy check in. Arianna was very easy to reach and also flexible with some unexpected weather emergencies that altered our trip.
